info.title: Google Sheets Data Fetcher
info.description: Fetches the value of a specific cell from a Google Sheet using a Google Apps Script macro.

get.summary: Fetch the value of a specific cell from a Google Sheet

parameters.name: sheet_name
parameters.description: The name of the sheet to fetch the data from.

parameters.name: cell
parameters.description: The address of the cell to fetch the data from (e.g., B13).

200.description: A JSON object containing the value of the requested cell.

status.description: The status of the request ('success' or 'error').

value.description: The value of the requested cell (if the status is 'success').

message.description: An error message (if the status is 'error').
